00057 LightDialog::LightDialog(  TLightKit* currentLightKit, QVector< TSunShapeFactory* > sunshapeFactoryList, QWidget* parent )
00058 :QDialog( parent ), m_currentLightKit( currentLightKit ), m_currentSunShapeIndex( -1 ), m_newSunShape( 0 )
00059 {
00060         setupUi( this );
00061         connect( sunshapeParameters, SIGNAL( valueModificated( SoNode*, QString, QString ) ), this, SLOT( SetValue( SoNode*, QString, QString ) ) );
00062 
00063 
00064         for( int sunShape = 0; sunShape < (int) sunshapeFactoryList.size(); ++sunShape )
00065         {
00066                 QString sunShapeTypeName( sunshapeFactoryList[sunShape]->CreateTSunShape()->getTypeId().getName().getString() );
00067                 m_sunshapeList.insert( sunShapeTypeName, sunshapeFactoryList[sunShape] );
00068         }
00069 
00070         if( currentLightKit )
00071         {
00072                 if( currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) )    m_newSunShape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false )->copy( true ) );
00073         }
00074 
00075         SunPositionTab();
00076         SunshapeTab();
00077 
00078 }

00091 TLightKit* LightDialog::GetTLightKit()
00092 {
00093         TLightKit* lightKit = new TLightKit;
00094 
00095         if( m_newSunShape ) lightKit->setPart( "tsunshape", m_newSunShape );
00096         //if( m_newShape ) lightKit->setPart( "icon", m_newShape );
00097 
00098         lightKit->ChangePosition( azimuthSpin->value()* tgc::Degree, ( 90 - elevationSpin->value() ) * tgc::Degree/*, distanceSpin->value()*/ );
00099         return lightKit;
00100 }

00105 void LightDialog::accept()
00106 {
00107         if( sunshapeCombo->currentIndex() == 0 )
00108                 QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh" ), tr( "You must select a sunshape type." ), QMessageBox::Ok );
00109 
00110         else
00111                 QDialog::accept();
00112 }

00114 void LightDialog::SetValue( SoNode* node, QString paramenterName, QString newValue )
00115 {
00116         SoField* parameterField = node->getField( SbName( paramenterName.toStdString().c_str() ) );
00117         if( parameterField )
00118                 parameterField->set( newValue.toStdString().c_str() );
00119 
00120 }
00121 
00125 void LightDialog::ChangeSunshape( int index )
00126 {
00127         while( (m_newSunShape!=0) && m_newSunShape->getRefCount() > 0 ) m_newSunShape->unref();
00128         if( index == 0 ) m_newSunShape = 0;
00129         else if( index == m_currentSunShapeIndex)       m_newSunShape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( m_currentLightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false )->copy( true ) );
00130         else
00131         {
00132                 TSunShapeFactory* sunshapeFactory = m_sunshapeList.value( sunshapeCombo->itemData( index ).toString() );
00133                 m_newSunShape = sunshapeFactory->CreateTSunShape();
00134 
00135         }
00136 
00137         sunshapeParameters->SetContainer( m_newSunShape, QString() );
00138 }

00164 void LightDialog::SunPositionTab()
00165 {
00166         if( m_currentLightKit )
00167         {
00168                 azimuthSpin->setValue( m_currentLightKit->azimuth.getValue() / tgc::Degree );
00169                 elevationSpin->setValue( 90 - ( m_currentLightKit->zenith.getValue() / tgc::Degree ) );
00170                 //distanceSpin->setValue( m_currentLightKit->distance.getValue() );
00171         }
00172 
00173 }

00206 
00207 void LightDialog::SunshapeBox()
00208 {
00209         connect( sunshapeCombo, SIGNAL( activated( int ) ), this, SLOT( ChangeSunshape( int ) ) );
00210 
00211         //Add elements to sunshape combo
00212         QList< TSunShapeFactory* > sunShapeFactoryList = m_sunshapeList.values();
00213         sunshapeCombo->addItem ( "---" );
00214         for( int i = 0; i < sunShapeFactoryList.size(); ++i )
00215                 sunshapeCombo->addItem( sunShapeFactoryList[i]->TSunShapeIcon(), sunShapeFactoryList[i]->TSunShapeName(),m_sunshapeList.key( sunShapeFactoryList[i] ) );
00216 
00217         //Select current LightKit Sunshape
00218         m_currentSunShapeIndex = 0;
00219         if( m_newSunShape )
00220         {
00221                 QString name( m_newSunShape->getTypeId().getName() );
00222                 m_currentSunShapeIndex = sunshapeCombo->findData( name );
00223         }
00224 
00225     ChangeSunshape( m_currentSunShapeIndex );
00226     sunshapeCombo->setCurrentIndex( m_currentSunShapeIndex );
00227 }
